body:
I'm Bill Schofield and I work for [ThoughtWorks](www.thoughtworks.com) as a Lead Consultant.

My passions are:
* Agile Software Development
* [Game Development](http://www.mobygames.com/developer/sheet/view/developerId,34096/)
* [Agile Governance](http://www.holacracy.org/)
* Teaching & Coaching
